com.compendium.io.jabber
Interface BSPresenceListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
BSConfBean, BSPresenceAdapter, IXPanel, Jabber, MeetingReplay
public interface BSPresenceListener

BSPresenceListener is interface you can implement to get presence changes notifications.

Method Summary
 void presenceChanged(BSPresenceInfo pi)
          Called then presence is changed
 void presencesCleared()
          Called after disconnecting - no presence info is available
 void subscriptionApproved(JID jid)
          Called when subscription request was approved
 void subscriptionRequested(JID jid)
          Called when subscription request was received
